events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product does not meet my needs.
The case was reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back related to an incorrect item delivered.
This issue was assigned to agent Sarah Williams for further handling and communication with the customer.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I am here to help you with your refund request and will guide you through the process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the mistake and proceed accordingly?
Here is the order number 123456789 and attached is the photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the wrong item back at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and refund offer, that works well for me.
The refund process has been completed on our side, and you should see the money back in your account within 5 business days.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is settled. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund has been processed and no further requests are outstanding, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
